response.body:
Forbidden

You don't have permission to access /index.html on this server.

messages: Warning. Found 2 byte(s) in ARGS:exec outside range: 38,44-46,48-58,61,65-90,95,97-122. [file "/etc/modsecurity.d/owasp-crs/rules/REQUEST-920-PROTOCOL-ENFORCEMENT.conf"] [line "1391"] [id "920273"] [msg "Invalid character in request (outside of very strict set)"] [data "ARGS:exec=/bin/bash"] [severity "CRITICAL"] [ver "OWASP_CRS/3.2.0"] [tag "application-multi"] [tag "language-multi"] [tag "platform-multi"] [tag "attack-protocol"] [tag "OWASP_CRS"] [tag "OWASP_CRS/PROTOCOL_VIOLATION/EVASION"] [tag "paranoia-level/4"]
